attributes.action: Introduce an additional Bank Holiday Monday the day after Remembrance Sunday.
attributes.additional_details: Because people who have lost their lives to conflict have made the ultimate sacrifice for their nation. A day which gives the opportunity for the whole country to recognise this is much more inclusive than just a Sunday. Bank Holidays also bring communities together and can help boost the economy.
attributes.background: To introduce a new November national Bank Holiday Monday to follow Remembrance Sunday in recognition of all those we have lost to conflict. It should be called Remembrance Bank Holiday.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Make Armistice Day a bank holiday" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750643
